title: Bug 2529 [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
OB: Currently, the Close Project menu item is not available.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should either be available or neither of them should be available.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Select both P1 and P2
2. Observe that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
